name: OppenheimerFunds, Inc.
goal: OFI is a US based investment adviser with actively managed equity, fixed income, alternative, and multi-asset portfolios, as well as factor and revenue-weighted ETF strategies.  These portfolio and strategies are offered in commingled vehicles including mutual funds and UCITS, as well as on a separate account basis to institutional investors.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives: OFI may engage EU institutions on financial services issues but also on broader trade and EU single market policies.
